verses.verse: וְלִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the sons אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> of Aaron מַחְלְקוֹתָ֑ם <S%H4256><s%> Now [these are] the divisions בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> The sons אַהֲרֹ֔ן <S%H175><s%> of Aaron נָדָב֙ <S%H5070><s%> Nadab וַאֲבִיה֔וּא <S%H30><s%> and Abihu אֶלְעָזָ֖ר <S%H499><s%> Eleazar וְאִיתָמָֽר׃ <S%H385><s%> and Ithamar

וַיָּ֨מָת <S%H4191><s%> died נָדָ֤ב <S%H5070><s%> But Nadab וַאֲבִיהוּא֙ <S%H30><s%> and Abihu לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before אֲבִיהֶ֔ם <S%H1><s%> their father וּבָנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> and had no children לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no הָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> and had לָהֶ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> like וַֽיְכַהֲנ֔וּ <S%H3547><s%> executed the priest's office אֶלְעָזָ֖ר <S%H499><s%> therefore Eleazar וְאִיתָמָֽר׃ <S%H385><s%> and Ithamar

וַיֶּֽחָלְקֵ֣ם <S%H2505><s%> distributed דָּוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> And David וְצָדוֹק֙ <S%H6659><s%> them both Zadok מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the sons אֶלְעָזָ֔ר <S%H499><s%> of Eleazar וַאֲחִימֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H288><s%> and Ahimelech מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the sons אִיתָמָ֑ר <S%H385><s%> of Ithamar לִפְקֻדָּתָ֖ם <S%H6486><s%> according to their offices בַּעֲבֹדָתָֽם׃ <S%H5656><s%> in their service

וַיִּמָּצְא֣וּ <S%H4672><s%> found בְֽנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the sons אֶלְעָזָ֡ר <S%H499><s%> of Eleazar רַבִּ֞ים <S%H7227><s%> And there were more לְרָאשֵׁ֧י <S%H7218><s%> chief הַגְּבָרִ֛ים <S%H1397><s%> men מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> than בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> than of the sons אִיתָמָ֖ר <S%H385><s%> of Ithamar וַֽיַּחְלְק֑וּם <S%H2505><s%> and [thus] were they divided לִבְנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> Among the sons אֶלְעָזָ֜ר <S%H499><s%> of Eleazar רָאשִׁ֤ים <S%H7218><s%> chief men לְבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house אָבוֹת֙ <S%H1><s%> of [their] fathers שִׁשָּׁ֣ה <S%H8337><s%> six עָשָׂ֔ר <S%H6240><s%> teen וְלִבְנֵ֧י <S%H1121><s%> among the sons אִיתָמָ֛ר <S%H385><s%> of Ithamar לְבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> according to the house אֲבוֹתָ֖ם <S%H1><s%> of their fathers שְׁמוֹנָֽה׃ <S%H8083><s%> and eight

וַיַּחְלְק֥וּם <S%H2505><s%> Thus were they divided בְּגוֹרָל֖וֹת <S%H1486><s%> by lot אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> one sort עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> with another כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הָי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> become שָֽׂרֵי־ <S%H8269><s%> for the governors קֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <S%H6944><s%> of the sanctuary וְשָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> and governors הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> [of the house] of God מִבְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> were of the sons אֶלְעָזָ֖ר <S%H499><s%> of Eleazar וּבִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> and of the sons אִיתָמָֽר׃ <S%H385><s%> of Ithamar ס

וַֽיִּכְתְּבֵ֡ם <S%H3789><s%> wrote שְֽׁמַֽעְיָה֩ <S%H8098><s%> And Shemaiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נְתַנְאֵ֨ל <S%H5417><s%> of Nethaneel הַסּוֹפֵ֜ר <S%H5608><s%> the scribe מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַלֵּוִ֗י <S%H3881><s%> [one] of the Levites לִפְנֵ֨י <S%H6440><s%> them before הַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king וְהַשָּׂרִים֙ <S%H8269><s%> and the princes וְצָד֣וֹק <S%H6659><s%> and Zadok הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest וַאֲחִימֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H288><s%> and Ahimelech בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֶבְיָתָ֔ר <S%H54><s%> of Abiathar וְרָאשֵׁי֙ <S%H7218><s%> and [before] the chief הָֽאָב֔וֹת <S%H1><s%> of the fathers לַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> of the priests וְלַלְוִיִּ֑ם <S%H3881><s%> and Levites בֵּֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> household אָ֣ב <S%H1><s%> principal אֶחָ֗ד <S%H259><s%> one אָחֻז֙ <S%H270><s%> being taken לְאֶלְעָזָ֔ר <S%H499><s%> for Eleazar וְאָחֻ֥ז ׀ <S%H270><s%> and [one] taken אָחֻ֖ז <S%H270><s%> taken לְאִיתָמָֽר׃ <S%H385><s%> for Ithamar פ

וַיֵּצֵ֞א <S%H3318><s%> came forth הַגּוֹרָ֤ל <S%H1486><s%> lot הָרִאשׁוֹן֙ <S%H7223><s%> Now the first לִיה֣וֹיָרִ֔יב <S%H3080><s%> to Jehoiarib לִֽידַעְיָ֖ה <S%H3048><s%> to Jedaiah הַשֵּׁנִֽי׃ <S%H8145><s%> the second
לְחָרִם֙ <S%H2766><s%> to Harim הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֔י <S%H7992><s%> The third לִשְׂעֹרִ֖ים <S%H8188><s%> to Seorim הָרְבִעִֽי׃ <S%H7243><s%> the fourth
לְמַלְכִּיָּה֙ <S%H4441><s%> to Malchijah הַחֲמִישִׁ֔י <S%H2549><s%> The fifth לְמִיָּמִ֖ן <S%H4326><s%> to Mijamin הַשִּׁשִּֽׁי׃ <S%H8345><s%> the sixth
לְהַקּוֹץ֙ <S%H6976><s%> to Hakkoz הַשְּׁבִעִ֔י <S%H7637><s%> The seventh לַאֲבִיָּ֖ה <S%H29><s%> to Abijah הַשְּׁמִינִֽי׃ <S%H8066><s%> the eighth
לְיֵשׁ֙וּעַ֙ <S%H3442><s%> to Jeshua הַתְּשִׁעִ֔י <S%H8671><s%> The ninth לִשְׁכַנְיָ֖הוּ <S%H7935><s%> to Shecaniah הָעֲשִׂרִֽי׃ <S%H6224><s%> the tenth
לְאֶלְיָשִׁיב֙ <S%H475><s%> to Eliashib עַשְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H6249><s%> eleven עָשָׂ֔ר <S%H6240><s%> ten לְיָקִ֖ים <S%H3356><s%> to Jakim שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> ten
לְחֻפָּה֙ <S%H2647><s%> to Huppah שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <S%H7969><s%> three עָשָׂ֔ר <S%H6240><s%> ten לְיֶֽשֶׁבְאָ֖ב <S%H3428><s%> to Jeshebeab אַרְבָּעָ֥ה <S%H702><s%> four עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> teen
לְבִלְגָּה֙ <S%H1083><s%> to Bilgah חֲמִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H2568><s%> fif עָשָׂ֔ר <S%H6240><s%> teen לְאִמֵּ֖ר <S%H564><s%> to Immer שִׁשָּׁ֥ה <S%H8337><s%> six עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> teen
לְחֵזִיר֙ <S%H2387><s%> to Hezir שִׁבְעָ֣ה <S%H7651><s%> seven עָשָׂ֔ר <S%H6240><s%> teen לְהַפִּצֵּ֖ץ <S%H6483><s%> to Aphses שְׁמוֹנָ֥ה <S%H8083><s%> eight עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> teen
לִֽפְתַחְיָה֙ <S%H6611><s%> to Pethahiah תִּשְׁעָ֣ה <S%H8672><s%> nine עָשָׂ֔ר <S%H6240><s%> teen לִֽיחֶזְקֵ֖אל <S%H3168><s%> to Jehezekel הָעֶשְׂרִֽים׃ <S%H6242><s%> the twentieth

לְיָכִין֙ <S%H3199><s%> to Jachin אֶחָ֣ד <S%H259><s%> The one וְעֶשְׂרִ֔ים <S%H6242><s%> and twentieth לְגָמ֖וּל <S%H1577><s%> to Gamul שְׁנַ֥יִם <S%H8147><s%> the two וְעֶשְׂרִֽים׃ <S%H6242><s%> and twentieth

לִדְלָיָ֙הוּ֙ <S%H1806><s%> to Delaiah שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <S%H7969><s%> The three וְעֶשְׂרִ֔ים <S%H6242><s%> and twentieth לְמַֽעַזְיָ֖הוּ <S%H4590><s%> to Maaziah אַרְבָּעָ֥ה <S%H702><s%> the four וְעֶשְׂרִֽים׃ <S%H6242><s%> and twentieth פ

אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These פְקֻדָּתָ֞ם <S%H6486><s%> These [were] the orderings לַעֲבֹדָתָ֗ם <S%H5656><s%> of them in their service לָב֤וֹא <S%H935><s%> to come לְבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> into the house יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כְּמִשְׁפָּטָ֔ם <S%H4941><s%> according to their manner בְּיַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> under אַהֲרֹ֣ן <S%H175><s%> Aaron אֲבִיהֶ֑ם <S%H1><s%> their father כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֔הוּ <S%H6680><s%> had commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel פ

וְלִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the sons לֵוִ֖י <S%H3878><s%> of Levi הַנּוֹתָרִ֑ים <S%H3498><s%> And the rest לִבְנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> [were these] Of the sons עַמְרָם֙ <S%H6019><s%> of Amram שֽׁוּבָאֵ֔ל <S%H7619><s%> Shubael לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the sons שׁוּבָאֵ֖ל <S%H7619><s%> of Shubael יֶחְדְּיָֽהוּ׃ <S%H3165><s%> Jehdeiah
לִרְחַבְיָ֑הוּ <S%H7345><s%> Concerning Rehabiah לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the sons רְחַבְיָ֔הוּ <S%H7345><s%> of Rehabiah הָרֹ֖אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> the first יִשִּׁיָּֽה׃ <S%H3449><s%> [was] Isshiah
לַיִּצְהָרִ֣י <S%H3325><s%> Of the Izharites שְׁלֹמ֔וֹת <S%H8013><s%> Shelomoth לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the sons שְׁלֹמ֖וֹת <S%H8013><s%> of Shelomoth יָֽחַת׃ <S%H3189><s%> Jahath

וּבְנָ֖י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons יְרִיָּ֑הוּ <S%H3404><s%> [of Hebron] Jeriah אֲמַרְיָ֙הוּ֙ <S%H568><s%> [the first] Amariah הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <S%H8145><s%> the second יַחֲזִיאֵל֙ <S%H3166><s%> Jahaziel הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֔י <S%H7992><s%> the third יְקַמְעָ֖ם <S%H3360><s%> Jekameam הָרְבִיעִֽי׃ <S%H7243><s%> the fourth

בְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> [Of] the sons עֻזִּיאֵל֙ <S%H5816><s%> of Uzziel מִיכָ֔ה <S%H4318><s%> Michah לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the sons מִיכָ֖ה <S%H4318><s%> of Michah [שָׁמוּר כ] (שָׁמִֽיר׃ <S%H8053><s%> Shamir ק)

אֲחִ֤י <S%H251><s%> The brother מִיכָה֙ <S%H4318><s%> of Michah יִשִּׁיָּ֔ה <S%H3449><s%> [was] Isshiah לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the sons יִשִּׁיָּ֖ה <S%H3449><s%> of Isshiah זְכַרְיָֽהוּ׃ <S%H2148><s%> Zechariah

בְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> The sons מְרָרִי֙ <S%H4847><s%> of Merari מַחְלִ֣י <S%H4249><s%> [were] Mahli וּמוּשִׁ֔י <S%H4187><s%> and Mushi בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> the sons יַעֲזִיָּ֥הֽוּ <S%H3269><s%> of Jaaziah בְנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> Beno

בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> The sons מְרָרִ֑י <S%H4847><s%> of Merari לְיַֽעֲזִיָּ֣הֽוּ <S%H3269><s%> by Jaaziah בְנ֔וֹ <S%H1121><s%> Beno וְשֹׁ֥הַם <S%H7719><s%> and Shoham וְזַכּ֖וּר <S%H2139><s%> and Zaccur וְעִבְרִֽי׃ <S%H5681><s%> and Ibri
לְמַחְלִי֙ <S%H4249><s%> Of Mahli אֶלְעָזָ֔ר <S%H499><s%> [came] Eleazar וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no הָ֥יָה <S%H1961><s%> had ל֖וֹ בָּנִֽים׃ <S%H1121><s%> who had no sons
לְקִ֖ישׁ <S%H7027><s%> Concerning Kish בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> the son קִ֥ישׁ <S%H7027><s%> of Kish יְרַחְמְאֵֽל׃ <S%H3396><s%> [was] Jerahmeel

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> The sons מוּשִׁ֔י <S%H4187><s%> also of Mushi מַחְלִ֥י <S%H4249><s%> Mahli וְעֵ֖דֶר <S%H5740><s%> and Eder וִירִימ֑וֹת <S%H3406><s%> and Jerimoth אֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> These [were] the sons הַלְוִיִּ֖ם <S%H3881><s%> of the Levites לְבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> after the house אֲבֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> of their fathers

וַיַּפִּילוּ֩ <S%H5307><s%> These likewise cast גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> also הֵ֨ם <S%H1992><s%> These גּוֹרָל֜וֹת <S%H1486><s%> lots לְעֻמַּ֣ת ׀ <S%H5980><s%> over against אֲחֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H251><s%> their brethren בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> the sons אַהֲרֹ֗ן <S%H175><s%> of Aaron לִפְנֵ֨י <S%H6440><s%> in the presence דָוִ֤יד <S%H1732><s%> of David הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> the king וְצָד֣וֹק <S%H6659><s%> and Zadok וַאֲחִימֶ֔לֶךְ <S%H288><s%> and Ahimelech וְרָאשֵׁי֙ <S%H7218><s%> and the chief הָֽאָב֔וֹת <S%H1><s%> of the fathers לַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> of the priests וְלַלְוִיִּ֑ם <S%H3881><s%> and Levites אָב֣וֹת <S%H1><s%> fathers הָרֹ֔אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> even the principal לְעֻמַּ֖ת <S%H5980><s%> over against אָחִ֥יו <S%H251><s%> brethren הַקָּטָֽן׃ <S%H6996><s%> their younger ס
